column4: Try looking at gnome-look.org for Ubuntu Studio-based icon sets or themes
And if you *really* wanted to, you could just copy/paste the icons from Studio into your normal one.
Alright, so just do the reverse of what I suggested lol
Go to GNOME Look and look for Ubuntu 10.10 icon sets. Or, if that fails, just copy them yourself. It's all in themes, not the system itself.
